DOC.brief_summary: Patients psoriasis vulgaris trunk and/or limb randomise treatment : 1 . 4 week ointment contain calcipotriol betamethasone dipropionate follow 8 week calcipotriol cream 2 . 4 week ( calcipotriol plus betamethasone dipropionate ) ointment follow 8 week calcipotriol cream weekdays/ ( calcipotriol plus betamethasone dipropionate ) ointment weekend 3 . 4 week ( calcipotriol plus betamethasone dipropionate ) ointment follow 8 week vehicle calcipotriol cream The objective compare efficacy safety different treatment regimen
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Calcipotriol Cream ( Calcipotriol + Betamethasone Dipropionate ) Ointment Psoriasis Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: A phase IV study different treatment regimen calcipotriol 50 mcg/g cream combination ( calcipotriol 50 mcg/g plus betamethasone 0.5 mg/g ( dipropionate ) ) ointment follow treatment combination ointment psoriasis vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Patients psoriasis vulgaris trunk and/or limb
